personal.title: Barber Management
personal.description: An ASP.NET MVC application developed for managing personal barber appointments and a centralized appointment system for multiple barbers. It also includes an AI feature that suggests hairstyles.

contributed.title: Test Monitor
contributed.description: A project developed for Etihad to regularly check customizable endpoints and log the results. The project is divided into API and Client sides. The API side is built with .NET Core and PostgreSQL, while the Client side uses React and Tailwind.

contributed.title: SanCC
contributed.description: A .NET Core application that triggers scheduled tasks. Accounting integration was implemented.
